query.prompt:
This text is written in Korean. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Roman (Word), Lemma, Roman (Lemma), Part of Speech, Case and Note.
* Leave blank if not applicable. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded.
1 우리 인생의 한가운데 길에서 9 내가 그곳에서 본 다른 것들에 대해 말씀드려야 합니다. 28 지친 몸을 조금 쉬인 후, 67 그는 나에게 대답했습니다. "나는 사람이 아니고, 한때 사람이었습니다.
query.result: |Word|Roman (Word)|Lemma|Roman (Lemma)|Part of Speech|Case|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |우리|uri|우리|uri|pronoun|nominative|1st person plural| |인생|insaeng|인생|insaeng|noun|nominative|| |의|ui|의|ui|particle|genitive|| |한가운데|hangawunde|한가운데|hangawunde|noun|nominative|| |길|gil|길|gil|noun|nominative|| |에서|eseo|에서|eseo|particle|locative|| |내가|naega|나|na|pronoun|nominative|1st person singular| |그곳|geukot|그곳|geukot|noun|nominative|| |에서|eseo|에서|eseo|particle|locative|| |본|bon|보다|boda|verb|past tense|| |다른|daleun|다르다|dareuda|adjective||| |것들|geotdeul|것|geot|noun|nominative|| |에|e|에|e|particle|dative|| |대해|daehae|대하다|daehada|verb||| |말씀드려야|malsseumdeoryeo|말씀드리다|malsseumdeurida|verb||| |합니다|hamnida|하다|hada|verb|present tense|| |지친|jichin|지치다|jichida|adjective||| |몸|mom|몸|mom|noun|nominative|| |을|eul|을|eul|particle|accusative|| |조금|jogeum|조금|jogeum|adverb||| |쉬인|swiin|쉬다|swida|verb|past tense|| |후|hu|후|hu|particle|after|| |그는|geuneun|그는|geuneun|pronoun|nominative|3rd person singular| |나에게|naege|나|na|pronoun|dative|1st person singular| |대답했습니다|daebaphaessumnida|대답하다|daebaphada|verb|past tense|| |나는|naneun|나|na|pronoun|nominative|1st person singular| |사람이|sarami|사람|saram|noun|nominative|| |아니고|anigo|아니다|anida|verb|present tense|| |한때|hantoe|한때|hantoe|noun|nominative|| |사람이었습니다|saramiessumnida|사람이다|saramida|verb|past tense||
